name: Calf Raises on Hackenschmitt Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Stand on the platform of the Hackenschmitt machine with your heels hanging off the edge, keeping your back to the machine.
2. Place your hands on the handles next to your shoulders for support and balance. 
3. Slowly raise up onto your tiptoes, keeping your knees straight and engaging your core muscle through the entire range of motion.
4. Pause briefly at the top of the movement with your body weight in a raised position.
5. Lower yourself back down slowly to start position, controlling the descent throughout.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on proper form and control.
short_summary: Calf raises using a Hackenschmitt machine target the soleus muscle of the calf
